headline: A Look At W. R. Berkley (WRB) Valuation After Recent Mixed Share Returns
summary: How W. R. Berkley Is Positioned After Recent Returns W. R. Berkley (WRB) has seen mixed share performance recently, with a 2.2% gain over the past month and an 8.8% decline over the past 3 months, putting fresh attention on its current valuation. At a last close of $69.92 and a value score of 2, investors are weighing that recent price action against the company’s size, roughly $14.71b in revenue and $1.78b in net income, and its broad commercial insurance and reinsurance footprint. See our...
